content: It’s one of the great lies that our brain tells us, isn’t it? That your creative efforts aren’t significant. You are the only you, and even if the idea is something someone else has had or is having at the same time, you will always do it differently than they are. Because you are a unique person colored by your memories, family, environment, friends, likes and dislikes. The human variable is impossible. But that’s what makes us so powerful.
